notes.title: Availability of data and materials
notes.p: The sequencing data in this study are available in the Sequence Read Archive (SRA). Metatranscriptome data and the 16S rRNA gene data are under accession numbers GSE126901 and GSE126900 (BioProject PRJNA523620), and the mRNAseq data under accession number GSE114588 (BioProject PRJNA471855). Scripts generating the data are available onÂ GitHub ( https://github.com/GhedinLab/Nicaragua_microbiome_flu_analysis).
